text: @Georgeberger @lastpositivist I'm not naming all this stuff by myself.

@jneuf @lastpositivist Jonathan. That plural might concern the number of Lords, not people. As I understand that word meaning is disputed. Maybe the Israelites adopted it from local culture but used it as a singular noun or proper name.

@lastpositivist "Elohim," in whose image you're made to have dominion over the earth, is plural. Our dominion is exercised together. Have you named everything over which you have dominion? I know my dept always thinks of something we overlooked. So God doesn't ALLOW the meeting. He commanded it.
Why would God allow there to be another departmental meeting tomorrow?
